contentList.content: A former marksman from a long-forgotten regiment, tasked with destroying dragonkind. With their unyielding strength, Dragon Slayers utilize Greatbows to pierce their enemies with arrows the size of spears

Dragon Slayers were an elite military unit in Rivellon. Training to become a dragon slayer started at a very young age, and not many endured long enough to become a slayer. The Order of the Dragon Slayers were created by vengeful knights that wanted justice for the death of the Divine at the hands of a dragon knight. In the past, the dragon slayers quickly went from a small band of knights to a mighty army of elites. Today, it is presumed the order was dissolved by Lucian after he was saved by the last Dragon Knight.

Adept mages who train in the ways of the sword, using special 'Runeblades' as a conduit to enhance their magic. Crafty use of the runes etched upon their blades allow Runic Knights to weave their attacks and spells together, devastating the battlefield

Runic Knights are mages who train in both the ways of the sword and spell, utilizing special 'Runeblades' as a conduit to enhance their magic. Crafty use of the runes etched upon their blades allow Runic Knights to weave their attacks and spells together, devastating the battlefield.
